title: Border, 1931–32
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Trellis border, printed two across. Row of circles, overprinted with a diamond trellis design. Printed in grisaille on a gray ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1931–32.
1931–32. Block-printed. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-74.
